body.name: PCCOOLER K4 Black Edition High-Performance CPU Cooler, 130mm PWM Turbo Fans, 230W TDP, 12.8W/m. k Thermal Paste, Anti-Gravity 4 Heat Pipes for AMD Ryzen AM4/AM5 Intel LGA1700/1200/1151/1150/1155/1156

asinVariationValues.variationValue: 1. Super anti-gravity heatpipe for up to...

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 24 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【High Performance 130MM Full Function PWM Fan】The standard 130mm booster fan is compatible with the 120mm fan hole downwards. The full load air volume is about 76.85CFM and the air pressure is 2.46mm/H2O. PCCOOLER 130mm case fan with turbocharging system, 10 reverse turbine teeth, enhances air pressure and air volume as well. Open fan inlet design, can increase the amount of air into the fan. This CPU Fan is safe and easy to maintain with the removable fan fasteners that made of metal materials for avoiding the possibility of damage in the transit.

【Super Anti-Gravity Heat Pipe-240W TDP】PCCOOLER CPU cooler has excellent anti-gravity 4x6mm heat pipes with stronger capillary pumping force, and effectively transfers heat from the CPU surface to the heat sink, regardless of whether the heat pipe is placed horizontally or sideways, have a better cooling performance in the PC case. Each heat pipe supports 60w Qmax and uses exclusive direct contact technology up to 240W TDP, effectively providing excellent heat dissipation. The shape and layout of the upgraded heat pipe are more suitable for the heat dissipation layout of high-end cpu cores.

【Premium Performance Thermal Paste】K4 CPU air cooler is equipped with PCCOOLER GT-3 high thermal conductivity thermal paste, which uses nano-diamond as the base material to effectively fill every gap and improve heat transfer efficiency. The ultra-high thermal conductivity is 12.8W/M.K, and it is very convenient to apply and wipe. Stable performance at -50 ℃ to 250℃. Improved performance of auxiliary radiator.

【Aluminum Heatsink for Efficient Heat Dissipation】The 130mm pure aluminum fins provide a cooling area of about 5900cm². Effectively improve the air pressure, improve the heat dissipation effect, more stable. In line with fluid mechanics, optimized fin heat dissipation array, uniform heat dissipation, the surface of the PCCOOLER special cooling coating, the top cover to improve the overall beauty of the tower.

【Support Sockets-New Design】Full metal center press point buckle. Support LGA1700/1200/1151/1150/1155/1156 and AMD AM4/AM5. Easy to install, durable, heat sink can be balanced pressure on the cpu. The CPU cooler base fits tightly to the cpu for increased heat transfer efficiency. More stable heat dissipation performance.

Air Flow: 76.85CFMMax. Static Pressure: 2.46mmH2ONoise: 17~29dB(A)Heat Pipes: 4x6mm Copper Powder Heat Pipes (4*U Type)Surface Treatment: Anti-oxidation Protective Layer 1 × CPU Cooler 1 × 130mm Case Fan 1 × Premium Performance Thermal Paste AM4 / AM5 Installation Kit INTEL 115X/1200/1700 Installation Kit

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brand Introduction PCCOOLER is one of the top national hi-tech enterprise with the research & development, production and sale for PC radiator. Devotes to providing excellent CPU cooler solution and thermal management system solve solution. Presently has owned 327 patents, with higher occupation rate of market, good brand reputation in PC radiator & LED heat sink fields. PCCOOLER K4 Edition High-Performance CPU Cooler 130mm PWM Turbo Fans SpecificationTDP: 230W （In testing with i9-12900K CPU, it can reach 240W TDP）Fan Dimension: 130×156×75mmFan Speed: 400-1600±10%RPMMax. Air Flow: 76.85CFMMax. Static Pressure: 2.46mmH2ONoise: 17~29dB(A)Heat Pipes: 4x6mm Copper Powder Heat Pipes (4*U Type)Surface Treatment: Anti-oxidation Protective Layer 1 × CPU Cooler 1 × 130mm Case Fan 1 × Premium Performance Thermal Paste AM4 / AM5 Installation Kit INTEL 115X/1200/1700 Installation Kit

130mm PWM Turbo Fan for Efficient Cooling The PCCOOLER 130mm Case Fan utilizes a turbocharging system with 10 reverse turbine teeth to enhance air pressure and volume. The open fan inlet design further improves airflow, providing superior cooling performance. Perfect for gamers, overclockers, and anyone who demands top-of-the-line cooling technology. Efficient Heat Dissipation with Aluminum CPU Heatsink Fins Our CPU cooler features 130mm pure aluminum fins, providing a cooling area of about 5900cm². This effectively improves air pressure and heat dissipation, resulting in stable and reliable cooling performance. Ideal for high-end CPUs and gaming PCs. 240W TDP-Capable Super Anti-Gravity Heat Pipe PCCOOLER CPU cooler is equipped with anti-gravity 4x6mm heat pipes, providing strong capillary pumping force for efficient heat transfer and excellent cooling performance up to 240W TDP. With exclusive direct contact technology, each heat pipe supports 60w Qmax, delivering optimal heat dissipation for high-end CPUs and gaming PCs. Choose PCCOOLER for reliable and professional-grade cooling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for $19 and I got to say it’s definitely worth the money. It by itself before I add other fans in my pc was dropping it from 47c to 39c just by itself! With added fans dropped to an insane 28-30c while on stress test! And for being quite a big fan is stays very quiet even at high throttle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Cooler for it's cost.
reviews.reviewText: I build and sell a lot of computers and normally do not leave reviews, but this cooler is more than well-deserved me leaving a review. This is the best cooler that I have ever bought at its price point. I highly recommend this cooler to anyone, and I will happily recommend it to anyone of my customers. If you are looking for a cooler and you are on a budget, there is no need to look any further because this cooler is for you. Its performance is just as amazing as its price. It has a solid mounting hardware that is way better than any other cooler at this price point and it includes everything you need. Solid affordable cooler without having to lose performance. I really hope that someone reads this review and decides to go with this cooler because I can promise you that you will not regret it in any way. I do not have one thing that I can complain about with this cooler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Está bien para el precio
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. El producto está muy bien, una vez instalado es bonito y cumple con su función, el problema fue al instalarlo, los resortes no bajaban bien y me tocó forzar los tornillos algo que hice ya que la placa es vieja y sólo quería revivir mi antigua computadora, de resto todo cómo debería de ser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It gets the purpose done
reviews.reviewText: It is asteticly pleasing, but it doesn't keep it as cool as I feel it shouldm the air around the export for the exhaust was blowing extremely warm, but it never over heated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty good.
reviews.reviewText: This brought my Idle Temp down from 58C-60C to 40C-45C and my Active Gaming Temp went down from 72C-74C to 60C-62C, this product works Very Well. It was a bit difficult to install as the nuts on the Heat Sink don't easily go onto the screws on the bracket, this is the only reason I gave it 4 Stars, otherwise it would be 5 Stars for me. Also, this Device is very Quiet.
